titleStmt.title: Three treatises of the vanity of the creature. The sinfulnesse of sinne. The life of Christ. Being the substance of severall sermons preached at Lincolns Inne: by Edward Reynoldes, preacher to that honourable society, and late fellow of Merton Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston for Robert Bostocke, and are to be sold at his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Kings Head,

notesStmt.note: "The vanitie of the creature", "The sinfulnes of sinne", and "The life of Christ" each have separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
A variant (STC 20934.5) has Henry Curteyne's name in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Pauls Churchyard at the signe of the Kings Head
